allow:
Bash(# Create temp files to store results
echo "Files with comprehensive headers:" > /tmp/with_headers.txt
echo "Files without comprehensive headers:" > /tmp/without_headers.txt

# Get all Swift files using glob
for file in ./Modules/**/*.swift ./Source/**/*.swift ./HomeInventoryModularTests/**/*.swift ./HomeInventoryModularUITests/**/*.swift ./Views/**/*.swift ./scripts/**/*.swift ./fastlane/**/*.swift; do
    if [ -f "$file" ]; then
        # Check if file has all required sections
        if grep -q "Apple Configuration:" "$file" && grep -q "Makefile Configuration:" "$file" && grep -q "Google Sign-In Configuration:" "$file"; then
            echo "$file" >> /tmp/with_headers.txt
        else
            echo "$file" >> /tmp/without_headers.txt
        fi
    fi
done

# Count results
echo "=== Summary ==="
echo "Files WITH comprehensive headers: $(grep -c "^" /tmp/with_headers.txt || echo 0)"
echo "Files WITHOUT comprehensive headers: $(grep -c "^" /tmp/without_headers.txt || echo 0)"
echo ""
echo "=== Files missing comprehensive headers ==="
cat /tmp/without_headers.txt | sort)
